FuncDef: The display configuration recover-result command displays information about configuration restoration after the upgrade.
Examples: The current startup saved-configuration file is cfcard:/test.cfg.
The number of failed commands is 0.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the startup saved-configuration command is run to specify the configuration file for the next startup and the device is restarted, you can run the display configuration recover-result command to view information about configuration restoration.
